Text displayed above the input field when entering a new passcode

trans-unit.target: Código de acceso incorrecto. Probá de nuevo (intentos restantes: %d).

trans-unit.target: Código de acceso incorrecto. Probá de nuevo.
trans-unit.note: Error message displayed when user enters incorrect passcode when trying to enter a protected section of the app

trans-unit.id: Maximum attempts reached. Please try again in an hour.

trans-unit.note: Error message displayed when user enters incorrect passcode and has reached the maximum number of attempts.

trans-unit.id: Maximum attempts reached. Please try again later.

trans-unit.target: Número máximo de intentos alcanzado. Por favor, intentalo de nuevo más tarde.

trans-unit.id: New passcode must be different than existing code.

trans-unit.target: Los códigos de acceso no coinciden. Intentalo de nuevo.

Text displayed above the input field when confirming a passcode

trans-unit.target: Se requiere el código de acceso

Title of the dialog used to set a passcode

Label used as a setting item to turn on passcode

Action button for deleting bookmarks in the bookmarks panel.
The folder name for the virtual folder that contains all desktop bookmarks.

trans-unit.id: Are you sure you want to delete it and its contents?

Button label to cancel deletion when the user tried to delete a non-empty folder.
Button label for the button that deletes a folder and all of its children.
Title of the confirmation alert when the user tries to delete a folder that still contains bookmarks and/or folders.
The cancel button when confirming clear history.
The button that clears history even when Sync is connected.

trans-unit.id: History will be removed from all your connected devices. This cannot be undone.

trans-unit.target: Se eliminará el historial de todos sus dispositivos conectados. Esta acción no se puede deshacer.

The confirmation button that clears history even when Sync is connected.

trans-unit.id: Remove history from your Firefox Account?

trans-unit.note: Title of the confirmation dialog shown when a user tries to clear history that's synced to another device.

trans-unit.id: This action will clear all of your private data, including history from your synced devices.

trans-unit.target: Esta acción borrará todos tus datos privados, incluyendo el historial de tus dispositivos sincronizados.
trans-unit.note: Description of the confirmation dialog shown when a user tries to clear history that's synced to another device.

trans-unit.id: Are you sure you want to clear all of your data? This will also close all open tabs.

trans-unit.target: ¿Seguro de que querés borrar todos tus datos? Esto también cerrará todas las pestañas abiertas.
trans-unit.note: Message shown in the dialog prompting users if they want to clear everything
Settings item for clearing browsing history
Settings item for clearing the cache
Used as a button label in the dialog to cancel clear private data dialog
Used as a button label in the dialog to Clear private data dialog

trans-unit.source: This lets you take and upload photos.

Esto te permite guardar las fotos.

trans-unit.source: Tap the mask icon to slip into Private Browsing mode.

trans-unit.target: Navegar como si nadie estuviera mirando
trans-unit.note: Title for the third panel 'Private Browsing' in the First Run tour.

trans-unit.source: Searching for something different? Choose another default search engine (or add your own) in Settings.

trans-unit.source: Use Sync to find the bookmarks, passwords, and other things you save to Firefox on all your devices.

trans-unit.source: Pick up where you left off

trans-unit.source: A modern mobile browser from Mozilla, the non-profit committed to a free and open web.

trans-unit.note: Description for the 'Welcome' panel in the First Run tour.
Title for the first panel 'Welcome' in the First Run tour.

trans-unit.target: Parece que Firefox se cerró inesperadamente. ¿Te gustaría restaurar tus pestañas?
trans-unit.note: Restore Tabs Prompt Description
Name for Mark as read button in reader mode Title for the button that marks a reading list item as read
Name for Mark as unread button in reader mode Title for the button that marks a reading list item as unread
Label for the button, displayed in the menu, used to turn night mode off. 'Off' is only displayed when the mode is on.
Label for the button, displayed in the menu, used to turn night mode on. 'Turn On' is an indication of state, and thus redundant.
Label for the button, displayed in the menu, used to turn no image mode off.
Label for the button, displayed in the menu, used to turn no image mode on.
Error for a missing remote error number
Error for a missing remote error message
Accessibility label for the navigation toolbar displayed at the bottom of the screen.
Accessibility label for the New Tab button in the tab toolbar.
Restore Tabs Negative Action
Message spoken by VoiceOver to indicate that there are no tabs in the Tabs Tray
Button to not save the user's password
OK button
Restore Tabs Affirmative Action
Title for prompt displayed to user after the app crashes

Button title displayed in a notification when a sent tab has been received. Tapping on the button will add the URL as a bookmark.

Title of notification received after a spurious message from FxA has been received.
Button title displayed in a notification when a sent tab has been received. Tapping on the button will open the URL.

trans-unit.source: New tab arrived from another device.
trans-unit.note: Body of notification shown when the device is sent one or more tabs from an unnamed device.
Title of notification shown when the device is sent one or more tabs from an unnamed device.
Body of notification shown when the device is sent one or more tabs from the named device. %@ is the placeholder for the app name.
Title of notification shown when the device is sent one or more tabs from the named device. %@ is the placeholder for the device name. This device name will be localized by that device.

Title displayed in header of the setting panel.
Label displayed under the 'Show Homepage Icon In Menu' option. It describes the effect of this setting when disabled.
Label used as an item in Settings. User can toggle this setting to show the home page button in menu, or on toolbar.

Title of the setting section containing the URL of the current home page.

Button in settings to use the current page as home page.
Button in settings to use the default home page. If no default is set, then this button isn't shown.

Option in settings to show bookmarks when you open a new tab

Option in settings to show your homepage when you open a new tab
Option in settings to show reading list when you open a new tab

Title displayed in header of the setting panel.
Description displayed under the ”Offer to Open Copied Link” option. See https://bug1223660.bmoattachments.org/attachment.cgi?id=8898349
Title of setting to enable the Go to Copied URL feature. See https://bug1223660.bmoattachments.org/attachment.cgi?id=8898349

Label used as an item in Settings. When touched it will open a dialog to configure the open with (mail links) behaviour.

trans-unit.source: You can choose which list Firefox will use to block Web elements that may track your browsing activity.

trans-unit.source: Tracking is the collection of your browsing data across multiple websites. Tracking can be used to build a profile and display content based on your browsing and personal information.

The Remote Clients sync component, used in SyncState.Partial.Title

The Logins sync component, used in SyncState.Partial.Title
Title for Sync status message when Sync failed to start.
Title for Sync status message when Sync failed due to being offline
Title for Sync status message when a component of Sync failed to complete, where %@ represents the name of the component, i.e. Sync is experiencing issues syncing Bookmarks
The Tabs sync component, used in SyncState.Partial.Title

Message spoken by VoiceOver saying the position of the single currently visible tab in Tabs Tray, along with the total number of tabs. E.g. \"Tab 2 of 5\" says that tab 2 is visible (and is the only visible tab), out of 5 tabs total.

Message spoken by VoiceOver saying the range of tabs that are currently visible in Tabs Tray, along with the total number of tabs. E.g. \"Tabs 8 to 10 of 15\" says tabs 8, 9 and 10 are visible, out of 15 tabs total.
Accessibility label for the Tabs Tray view.

A brief descriptive name for this app on this device, used for Send Tab and Synced Tabs. The first argument is the app name. The second argument is the device name.
The name of the folder that contains desktop bookmarks in the menu. This should match bookmarks.folder.menu.label on Android.
The name of the folder that contains desktop bookmarks in the toolbar. This should match bookmarks.folder.toolbar.label on Android.
